description.@en: Contacting the world between here and elsewhere, you call forth a poltergeist to rattle its chains and haunt an area.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, you can conjure ghostly sounds or voices, which manifest as a low whisper or a dull roar. They can only mimic natural sounds or voices that your Character would know (the GM may require you as the player to sound them out at the game table).

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but instead those who witness the Haunting suffer from Stress.

criticalFailure.@en: You are contacted by the Abyssal Princes, babbling in ancient languages within your mind. A terrible secret of your past is revealed to you. You immediately suffer 3 Corruption.

reagents.@en: The death shroud of someone murdered

system.distance: Any one place you can see
